title: NDAData
description: Data schema for the Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) template - a legal contract protecting confidential information shared between parties

party_a_name.description: The full legal name of the disclosing party (Party A) - typically the company sharing confidential information

party_a_address.description: The complete mailing address of Party A, including street, city, state, and ZIP code. Use newline characters (\n) for multi-line formatting

party_b_name.description: The full legal name of the receiving party (Party B) - the entity receiving confidential information

party_b_address.description: The complete mailing address of Party B, including street, city, state, and ZIP code. Use newline characters (\n) for multi-line formatting

effective_date.description: The date when the NDA becomes legally binding and effective

confidential_info_description.description: A detailed description of the types of confidential information covered by this agreement. Be specific about trade secrets, technical data, business information, etc.
confidential_info_description.example: Technical specifications, software source code, algorithms, product roadmaps, business strategies, customer lists, pricing information, financial data, and any other proprietary information related to the parties' technology and business operations.

term_years.description: The duration of the confidentiality obligations in years. Common values are 2, 3, or 5 years

governing_law.description: The state or jurisdiction whose laws will govern the interpretation and enforcement of this agreement

signature_date.description: The date when the NDA is signed by both parties

examples.confidential_info_description: Technical specifications, software source code, algorithms, product roadmaps, business strategies, customer lists, pricing information, financial data, marketing plans, and any other proprietary information related to the parties' technology and business operations.
